name: Doctor SKULL
description:
Instruction:
  • z = Jump
  • x = Attack
  • Left & Right Arrow Key = move

>>> Stage will Restart once you are DEAD  <<<

Credit:
  • Artist - Jasmin Younis
  • Programmer & SFX Designer - Thong Huynh
Description:

In this game, the player will be the Dr. SKULL who is actually the embodiment of a skeleton-the living dead. Throughout this journey, the Dr. will collect vampire teeth to offer to the coffin at the end of the stage to move to the next level. Players will fight hunters (humanoid robots) along their way to the finishing point.

Backstory: 

In the XXXX year, humans and ghosts (ghost, undead, vampire...) lived in peace together on the land called (…). However, a major ghost-hunt event happened over the whole land as the new king of the human tribe started his reign. The new king is scared of the ghosts' existence so he assigned his humanoid robot army to capture all the ghosts on-sight…..

Thought it will be the end for the ghost village, you - the player, as Dr.SKULL - just come back from the journey to help other ghost fellows, hear about the recent attack, and that they captured your friends in an abandoned castle nearby. You start your new journey to bring freedom back to the village once again...
